ol.text: The Client is of the opinion that the Consultant has the necessary qualifications, experience and abilities to provide consulting services to the Client.
The Consultant is agreeable to providing such consulting services to the Client on the terms and conditions set out in this Agreement.

text: the matters described above and of the mutual benefits and obligations set forth in this Agreement, the receipt and sufficiency of which consideration is hereby acknowledged, the Client and the Consultant (individually the 'Party' and collectively the 'Parties' to this Agreement) agree as follows:

content.text: The Client hereby agrees to engage the Consultant to provide the Client with consulting services (the 'Services') as desribed in Appendix 1.
The Services will also include any other consulting tasks which the Parties may agree on. The Consultant hereby agrees to provide such Services to the Client.

The Client understands that additional work beyond the scope of this Agreement, or other agreed upon consulting tasks, must be negotiated separately, will require a separate Agreement, and will be billed separately at the full standard hourly rate according to service category with payment due upon receipt.
The Services are quantified in FlexiTime Token (the 'Token') units, as defined in Appendix 2.
Token unit balances are tracked by a smart contract deployed at '{{ agreementAddress }}' address on an Ethereum network with genesis hash '{{ genesisHash }}'.

Tokens can be redeemed by the Client for Consultant's time by creating a new FlexiTime Task (the 'Task') smart contract, and sending Token units from Client's Ethereum '{{ beneficiary }}' address to contract's address. Once the Task has been completed by the Consultant, the Client can instruct the Task to transfer token units out of it's escrow and to the Consultant's '{{ issuer }}' address, thus redeeming it. Consultant reserves the right to refuse any task request.
Tokens can be re-allocated by the Client between Services at will, until they have been escrowed by a Task.
Tokens must be redeemed by the Client within the Term of this Agreement. Un-used Tokens, unless carried over, expire after the Term of this Agreement, with no refund to the Client.

The term of this Agreement (the 'Term') will begin on the date of this Agreement and will remain in full force and effect until {{ expiresEnd }}, subject to earlier termination as provided in this Agreement. The Term of this Agreement may be extended with the written consent of the Parties.
In the event that either Party wishes to terminate this Agreement prior to {{ expiresEnd }}, that Party will be required to provide {{ agreement.notice }} days' written notice to the other Party.
Consultant shall make a reasonable attempt to finish work in progress. Any retainer fees are due in full for the intended period of cancellation if proper notice is not provided.
The Consultant will charge the Client a flat fee of {{ total }} {{ currency }} for the Services (the 'Payment').
The Payment is based on the sale of {{ totalSupply }} Tokens at {{ price }} {{ currency }} per Token.
